description: A cricuit have some inputs and produces some outputs. Inputs and outputs can be different objects: colors, floats, renderers, entities, etc.

generators.description: Generators in the circuit. A generator produces a constant value in the circuit, and only have outputs.

chips.description: Chips in the circuit. A chip produces some values from its inputs.

wires.description: Connections in the circuit. A wire can connect circuit input/output with generators and chips.
